position.type: top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br / left / lt / lb / right / rt / rb

v-model:popup-visible.description: The bubble confirms that the box is visible

default-popup-visible.description: Bubble confirmation box is visible by default (uncontrolled mode)
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 气泡确认框默认是否可见（非受控模式）

type.description: The type of bubble confirmation box

ok-text.description: Confirm the contents of the button

cancel-text.description: The contents of the cancel button

ok-loading.description: Check whether the button is loading
ok-loading.description_zh: 确认按钮是否为加载中状态

:ok-button-props.description: Confirm the Props of the button

:cancel-button-props.description: Cancel the Props of the button

content-class.description: The class name of the pop-up contents

:content-style.description: The style of the popover content

arrow-class.description: The class name of the pop-up arrow

:arrow-style.description: The style of the popover arrows

popup-container.description: The mount point of the pop-up box

events.name: before-ok
events.description: The callback function before the OK event is triggered. If it returns false, no subsequent events will be triggered, and you can also use done to close asynchronously.
events.description_zh: 触发 ok 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件，也可使用 done 进行异步关闭。
events.params: ( done: (closed: boolean) => void) => void | boolean | Promise<void | boolean>

events.name: before-cancel
events.description: The callback function before the cancel event is triggered. If false is returned, no subsequent event will be triggered.
events.description_zh: 触发 cancel 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件。

events.name: popup-visible-change
events.description: Triggered when the visible and hidden state of the bubble confirmation box changes
events.description_zh: 气泡确认框的显隐状态改变时触发

events.name: ok
events.description: Triggered when the Confirm button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked
